1.content:
The men and women of the audience walked into the white, windowless amphitheater and took their seats. Despite the masks and uniform black suits they all wore to avoid identification, it was obviously a wealthy and powerful group of people that were gathered that night. They had paid handsomely for the privilege of witnessing the evening’s events, and some of the excited murmuring came from distinctively recognizable voices. None of the members of this exclusive club would ever identify themselves or their colleagues, however - death was the most lenient penalty for violating that rule. This was an organization that trafficked in cruelty to an audience that delighted in it, and crossing such a group would be the last mistake one would ever make.

A loud buzzing noise from the back of the room signaled it was time for the show to start. The audience applauded as Cassandra Peterson, in full skimpy Elvira costume, strode confidently on to the stage. Unlike the real stars of the show, she (a long-time member of the exclusive club) had a smile on her face and an evil glint in her eye.

“Hello, darling perverts and pervertesses!” she exclaimed. “I’m Elvira, the Queen of Halloween. I’m here to present a different kind of horror show tonight,” she paused to raise an eyebrow, “And we won’t be the ones screaming.” A few chuckles came from the audience. “Let’s introduce tonight’s first guest of honor:
1.title: Introduction to the Game

11.content:
"...a red-headed bombshell (who packs two serious explosive devices in her dress), Ms. Christina Hendricks!”

Quivering and pale as a ghost, Christina was guided on to the stage by a pair of ski-masked guards. Scared as she may have been, Christina had been made to look red-carpet ready with a face of make-up and very low-cut red dress that emphasized her assets to a lewd degree. The two guards stood her next to Elvira and walked off to fetch the other guest. Though Christina was not tied up, she was certainly not a flight risk; a show of knives, electric prods, and various other instruments (along with graphically detailed descriptions of how they would be used should she try to escape) had made sure of that.

As the audience applauded politely, Elvira strode up to the night’s first victim for an interview.

“Christina, darling,” she said, putting her arm around the shivering starlet. “Why don’t you tell these good people how you came to be here with us tonight?”

“Wh- What?” came the meek answer. Staring off into space, poor Ms. Hendricks had checked out in terror a while ago. It would take a little nudging to make her back into showtime material.

The audience chuckled as Elvira turned to them and raised an eyebrow. “Hell-oo? Is anyone home?” She gave Christina a gentle knock on the forehead, bringing her back to reality.

The curvy actress jolted back into reality, resulting in more laughs and whistles from the audience. “I… I…” she began to stammer. “I was kidnapped… right from my bed in the middle of the night…”

“Sounds like a rude awakening,” Elvira interjected, hoping to keep her prey’s mind on task.

Christina nodded. “They tied me up and… threw me in the trunk of a car… I was dragged into a warehouse where a burly man cut off my clothes… After that it is a blur, I know there were at least five men on me but I don’t know how long they were there or what all they did to me. I just know I was in pain and exhausted afterwards.”

Elvira laughed. “Sounds like you had the fight fucked right out of you! Speaking of taking off clothes, why don’t you show these ladies and gentlemen the body that made them go out of their way to snatch you up in the first place."

Christina looked at the ground and nodded obediently. Her quivering arm brushed off the first of her dress’ straps, causing a few wolf whistles from the crowd. Her cheeks blushing beet-red, she hesitantly took off the other and the dress fell to the ground. Gloriously naked, her massive tits quivered in fear and a pretty red trimmed bush was visible to all in the room. The crowd applauded appropriately.

“Wowie-zowie!” shouted Elvira and she gave Christina a slap on the ass. “I might have some competition here.” Making a comical face, she pressed her own impressive jugs against Christina’s for comparison. Christina just closed her eyes and whimpered.

“Well, you definitely have the look of a luscious lay,” Elvira taunted the captive actress. “What was it that led you to end up here?”

“After the first night I woke up naked with my leg chained to a bed in a dark room. Men and women came in to rape me hour after hour, until I lost consciousness. If I tried to resist or refuse, I’d be beaten by the same burly man who kidnapped me and his friends.”

With her story up to speed, it was time Elvira gave Christina a harsh lesson in truth.

“Well darling, that’s why you are here. It seems one too many customers have given complaints about your unenthusiastic performances. For such a great actress, you’d think whoring would come easy!” The audience chuckled knowingly, many of them having seen such transformations firsthand. “But it looks like your owners have decided a farewell performance might bring out the full range of your skills.”

Christina’s jaw dropped and her eyes went wide as the realization of what she had been brought out for hit her. Her eyes darted around the room and she began to jibber.

“Don’t panic just yet!” Elvira said, putting her arm around Christina once again. “You have one chance to prove you are right for the whoring profession and send another poor starlet to her doom instead! Consider this your final audition! Folks, bring out the other star of the evening…”
11.title: Christina Gets the News

111.content:
“...Ms. Katy Perry!” Elvira finished, as the handlers brought out the evening’s second attraction. Ever the professional, Ms. Perry managed a smile as she strutted up to the stage. She wore a nearly-translucent pink dress that showed more cleavage than it hid, her nipples peeking out whenever she jiggled more than usual. She waved to the crowd, doing her best to suppress the fear that was so obviously burning in her eyes. The audience applauded wildly as Elvira started the introductions.

“Geeze, it looks like this pop star is already popping out of her dress!” The audience laughed at Katy’s obvious struggle to keep her breasts in her shirt. “Although she probably feels lucky to be wearing clothes again at all, with what she’s been up to.”

“You have that right,” Katy said, determined to win the audience’s favor with a perky attitude. She looked at shivering, totally nude Christina Hendricks on the other side of the stage. “Although I have a feeling that’s going to be too good to last.”

“Hahaha, you think we’re going to let you hide those cupcakes for long?” Elvira, doing her best to get a reaction out of the smiling starlet, punctuated both syllables of ‘cupcake’ by groping one of Katy’s massive tits. The pop singer scrunched her face and shut her eyes, but did not allow herself to snap. “Why don’t you tell us why you are here performing for us tonight instead of for your fans?”

Katy took a deep breath and began her tragic tale. “I was shooting a PSA about voting where I stripped down at the end and sat in a police car. Only instead of letting me out, the car just locked the doors and rolled off when the cameras stopped recording! I slammed on the windows and screamed, but the drivers just laughed. They pulled up to a warehouse, dragged me in, and stuffed me into a cage.”

Elvira gave an exaggerated look of surprise. “Even a tiger can be caged!” she said. “Speaking of stripping, how about you get that dress off while you finish your story?”

Still forcing a bright smile, Katy obliged. The audience hooted, whistled, cheered, and stomped as she began to peel off her dress, taking all the time she could. Though her outfit was loose and had been designed to come off quickly, she thought that a slow striptease might win the favor of the cruel perverts who had trapped her there.

As she turned her back to the audience to sensually strip off her clothes, Elvira got impatient. Grabbing the middle of her dress, she yanked it off in one motion. “Ack!” yelled Katy as she bent over to cover up, inadvertently spreading her round ass cheeks. The audience laughed and applauded uproariously as Katy remembered herself and turned, now flushed with barely-concealed embarrassment, to show off the goods.

“Well dreamgirl, what happened after you were in the cage?” Asked Elvira, kicking Katy’s dress off the stage and into the crowd.

“I was taken out one day and told that I had been sold. They dragged me from the cage and into the burning light, where I was handed over to Miche-” she paused, realizing that her mistress was by all likelihood in the audience that night. “I was handed over to a very powerful and beautiful ebony goddess.”

“You kissed a girl. Did you like it?” Elvira asked tauntingly.

“I did my best to please her, I really did. I ate her pussy as best as I know how, and I serviced all the powerful men and women she took in to impress them. But when my mistress wanted me to perform my songs nude for a group of visiting heads of state, I guess I got performance anxiety and forgot the lyrics. Now I’m here to try to make up for my mistakes.”

“Well honey,” said Elvira. “You’d better try your hardest, because if you mess up this time it won’t be your career that ends! It’ll be your life!” Despite her best efforts, Katy shivered at this.

“Now ladies and gentlemen, let the games begin! For our first competition, we have…”
111.title: Katy's Tale of Woe

info.brief_description: Female celebrities are captured and made to compete for their lives. Points for additions!
info.description: A secret society has long been abducting and using women for their nefarious live shows. Today, they are capturing female celebrities to compete in a life-or-death competition, totally nude!
